text: <item.asplor.tier_0_rocket> is the most basic of rockets, it's poorly made and looks like it's going to fall apart at any moment, but it's a necessity for your trip to <planet.asplor.the_nether>. It can't even take you safely back to <planet.minecraft.overworld>. As for how to get back, there may be some clues near the ruined portal......
